alert.note: Alert for Coconino (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flash Flood Warning issued August 17 at 12:47PM MST until August 17 at 3:00PM MST by NWS Flagstaff
info.description: ...FLASH FLOOD WARNING FOR THE PIPELINE FIRE SCAR BURN SCAR REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 3 PM MST THIS AFTERNOON FOR COCONINO COUNTY... At 1233 PM MST, emergency management reported water overtopping U.S. Highway 89. Between 0.5 and 1.75 inches of rain have fallen over the Pipeline Fire Scar. Additional rainfall amounts up to 0.25 inches are possible in the warned area. Flash flooding is already occurring. HAZARD...Life-threatening flash flooding. Thunderstorms producing flash flooding in and around the Pipeline Fire Scar. SOURCE...Emergency management reported. IMPACT...Life threatening flash flooding of areas in and around the Pipeline Fire Scar. Some locations that will experience flash flooding include... Wupatki Trails and Timberline. This includes the following highways... U.S. Highway 89 between mile markers 425 and 430. FLASH FLOOD...OBSERVED FLASH FLOOD DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE
info.instruction: Immediately move out of and away from creeks and washes in the Pipeline Fire Scar. Flash flooding is occurring or imminent. Turn Around, Don`t Drown if you encounter flood waters while driving.
